title: no FPS
body: got on league today and no matter what I get 1-3 fps, I usually uncap at around 130 fps and I cant get it to go back, reinstalled, trouble shooted, nothing works

replies.body:
Copy-pasting one of my posts on this issue, hope it helps:

>First of all, try [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en->us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping->on-High-End-PCs) if you haven’t already.

>If that option is unchecked, then it’s because you recently updated Windows and there’s something going on with the Xbox DVR/fullscreen optimization.

>[Here](https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=6239-DZCB-8600) you can see how to disable the Xbox DVR (it’s a known issue, for some reason it fucks your FPS up when enabled).
And [this](https://www.google.it/amp/s/amp.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/7drusz/psa_make_sure_to_disable_fullscreen_optimizations/), instead, is how to disable full screen optimization.

>If this didn’t help at all, you can just pray. There are some serious ongoing performance issues with the game and Riot is (I hope) actively trying to figure out how to fix them.

List hardware, running software, os/driver versions.

Other software works as intended? Has anything been recently updated?

windows updated last night, windows 10, Processor	Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7200U CPU @ 2.50GHz, 2701 Mhz, 2 Core(s), 4 Logical Processor(s)
nvidia gforce 940x

> windows updated last night

And you have to ask why? Reinstall graphics drivers and rollback if possible. Every mainline win10 patch for months has fucked up something.
ive searched for update on my drivers and it says I am up to date, it also does not let me roll back, I am not sure what I am supposed to do
